definition[0]: used to say how long someone works or does things every day, or when they work or do things
note[0]: work all the hours God sends (=work all the time that you can)
example[0]: the long hours worked by hospital doctors
example[1]: Many hospital staff have to work unsocial hours (=work in the evenings and weekends so that they cannot spend time with family or friends).
example[2]: She knew that he kept late hours (=stayed up late).
